title.rendered: NEWTECONS CONTINUES TO BE IN THE TOP OF THE LARGEST CONSTRUCTION COMPANIES IN VIETNAM 2019

content.rendered:
(HN – January 10th, 2020) At the Announcement Ceremony of Top 500 Largest Enterprises in Vietnam in 2019, Newtecons continues to be honored in the Ranking Chart with the 190th rank position out of 500. In particular, maintaining this achievement has helped Newtecons become one of the 12 largest enterprises in the construction industry in the country.

The Announcement Ceremony was organized by Vietnam Report in collaboration with VietNamNet Electronic Newspaper at InterContinental Hanoi Landmark 72 Hotel, Hanoi City. This is the 13th consecutive year the VNR500 Ranking has been researched and published to honor the largest enterprises in Vietnam that gain remarkable achievements in production and business activities.
